讓.definition: to yield; to permit; to let sb do sth; to have sb do sth; to make sb (feel sad etc); by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])

讓利.definition: to give a discount; to make a concession

讓坐.definition: to give up one's seat; to be seated

讓座.definition: to give up one's seat for sb

讓步.definition: to concede; to give in; to yield; a concession; (linguistics) concessive

讓渡.definition: to transfer (property, rights etc); to cede

讓畔.definition: to be accommodating in negotiating the boundary of one's field; (fig.) (of farmers in ancient times) to be good-hearted and honest

讓胡路.definition: Ranghulu district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang

讓胡路區.definition: Ranghulu district of Daqing city 大慶|大庆[Da4 qing4], Heilongjiang

讓賢與能.definition: to step aside and give a more worthy person a chance (idiom)

讓開.definition: to get out of the way; to step aside
